Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: equally adv 1: to the same degree (often followed by `as'); "they were equally beautiful"; "birds were singing and the child sang as sweetly"; "sang as sweetly as a nightingale"; "he is every bit as mean as she is" [syn: {as}, {every bit}] 2: in equal amounts or shares; in a balanced or impartial way; "a class evenly divided between girls and boys"; "they split their winnings equally"; "deal equally with rich and poor" [syn: {evenly}] [ant: {unevenly}, {unevenly}]
